type.description: Triggers release when a new version of an artifact is published to an Artifactory repository

property.name: repositoryId
property.description: Repository ID to watch, e.g. releases, snapshots, apache-snapshots

property.name: username
property.description: Custom username to override global server configuration

property.name: password
property.description: Custom password to override global server configuration

property.name: artifactVersion
property.description: Latest artifact version. For Snapshots the version includes timestamp and build number

property.name: artifactRepositoryPath
property.description: Artifact path relative to the selected Artifactory repository
